subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Bradley Wiggins of Britain and the defending champion, Cadel Evans of Australia, are the riders to beat in the absence of former champions Alberto Contador and Andy Schleck.
snippet: Bradley Wiggins of Britain and the defending champion, Cadel Evans of Australia, are the riders to beat in the absence of former champions Alberto Contador and Andy Schleck.
